text.section:
A member who is subject to this Part II of this subtitle shall:
receive an allowance for all creditable service as follows:
for normal service retirement as provided in § 26-401(b) of this title;
for ordinary disability retirement as provided in § 29-108 of this article; and
for accidental disability retirement as provided in §§ 29-109(c) and 29-110 of this article;
have the allowance adjusted as provided in Title 29, Subtitle 4, Part VI of this article; and
make member contributions at the rate specified in § 26-204(a) of this subtitle.
A member who is not subject to this Part II of this subtitle shall receive an allowance for accidental disability retirement as provided in §§ 29-109(c) and 29-110 of this article.
